citation_details.title: Eye-blink patterns reflect attention to continuous speech
citation_details.author: B Holtze, M Rosenkranz, MG Bleichner, M Jaeger
citation_details.abstract: Eye blinks do not only serve to maintain the tear film of the eye but also seem to have a  functional role in information processing. People tend to inhibit an eye blink when they expect
citation_details.short_author: B Holtze, M Rosenkranz, MG Bleichner, M Jaeger
